title: Harvesting Millions: Modern Vegetable Farming Unveiled

tasks.task: Explanation of the harvesting process for four vegetables (fennel, red cabbage, green onion, and broccoli)
subtasks: Sowing fennel seeds in early spring or fall
Monitoring fennel plant growth and development
Harvesting mature fennel using specialized machinery
Planting red cabbage seeds in fertile soil
Cultivating red cabbage plants until maturity
Harvesting red cabbage using mechanized cutting and sorting
Packing and transporting harvested red cabbage
Directly sowing green onion seeds in early spring
Growing green onions until the right size for harvesting
Using machinery to harvest green onions, then careful sorting
Crating and transporting packaged green onions
Planting broccoli seeds and nurturing seedlings
Harvesting broccoli using automated harvesters and human inspection
Chilling broccoli post-harvest before packaging and distribution
